name: Super Cube Jump
description:
This game was made in a few days for a game jam called Jam-Pot. This is also my first game I hope you enjoy it!

CONTROLS: Use the arrow keys to move or you can use A and D to move left and right and use the top arrow key to jump

RULES: You have to reach the red platform and you can jump a infinite number of times but once you double jump you can't jump anymore and you have to restart. If you fall off the edge or you can't jump anymore press the restart button.
